short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds the title ", Ph.D." to all untitled instances of everyone's favorite CSCI 201 professor

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PhDify:  A browser extension to add a proper title to our favorite CSCI 201 professor.

Source available at https://github.com/LionOfJewdah/PhDify
